item.title: State Department hits 4 antifa groups with foreign terrorist organization tags
item.description: The State Department on Thursday designated four antifa groups as foreign terrorist organizations.

item.title: Trump gains $25M in federal funds to boost foster child care
item.description: President Trump on Thursday unlocked $25 million in federal funding to provide housing and support for youth transitioning out of foster care.
